name: Faizan Ahmed

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science & Engineering

projects.title: SmileChain
projects.description: A MERN + Web3-based decentralized application that rewards users for their smiles. Leveraging AI and blockchain, it provides an engaging experience by turning smiles into valuable rewards, promoting positivity.

projects.title: ClipFlow
projects.description: An online clipboard built with Next.js that allows users to store and retrieve text and files using a unique, auto-generated refid. Features real-time syncing and a minimalist UI.

projects.title: Personal Contact Manager
projects.description: A full-stack MERN application for managing personal contacts. It allows users to register, login, create, view, edit, and delete their personal contacts with JWT authentication.

projects.title: Flicker
projects.description: An Android app and ESP32 firmware to remotely control RGB LED strips via Firebase. It features multiple lighting modes and real-time updates for both LEDs and other connected appliances.

projects.title: PokerPay
projects.description: An Android companion app for live poker nights that handles virtual chip management, allowing players to focus on the game. Features real-time bet tracking and game creation.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe Web App
projects.description: A classic Tic Tac Toe game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a single-player mode against an unbeatable AI opponent that uses the minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning.

experiences.organization: IIT Bhubaneswar - School of Electrical Sciences
description: Developed CUDA applications utilizing global, shared, and distributed shared memory for parallel programming using a GPU accelerator.
Analyzed the influence of operating systems on execution time variance in high-performance computing tasks.

about: As a self-motivated engineering student, I am curious about new technologies and their practical applications. With a strong foundation in languages like Java, C, JavaScript, and Python , and experience in web and Blockchain development , I am committed to applying my skills and leadership qualities to contribute to real-world projects.
contact: I'm always looking for exciting collaborations and new projects. If you're facing a creative challenge or have an idea you'd like to develop, I'd be thrilled to discuss how I can help bring it to life. I'm available for hire on a freelance basis and am also open to exploring full-time opportunities. Feel free to email me with any questions or opportunities you'd like to discuss. I'm open to various types of projects and collaborations.
